titles.title: Endangered Species Consolidation Act of 2001

To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to vest in the Secretary of the Interior functions under that Act with respect to species of fish that spawn in fresh or estuarine waters and migrate to ocean waters, and species of fish that spawn in ocean waters and migrate to fresh waters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from Commerce, Interior.

bill.summary: 6/28/2001--Introduced. Endangered Species Consolidation Act of 2001 - Transfers all functions with respect to anadromous species and catadromous species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973 that were vested in the Secretary of Commerce or the National Marine Fisheries Service immediately before the enactment of this Act to the Secretary of the Interior.
